overview: Television adaptation of the theater performance of the same name by the Dutch Ruut Weissman and George Groot. The Dutch cabaret artists Jenny Arean, Frits Lambrechts, Lucretia van der Vloot and Kasper van Kooten revive the vanished Jewish entertainment in Amsterdam. Recorded in the Tip Top theater caf√© of the Academie van de Kleinkunst in Amsterdam, which is on the same spot where the Tip Top Theater used to be.
title: Tip Top
